original_title: Kapag Iginuhit Ang Hatol Ng Puso
overview: The serial tells the tragic love story of Vina, a single woman who wants to have a baby despite her advanced age. With the help of her best friend, she met Dave, the man she will eventually fall in love and have a child with. Unknown to Vina, Dave was her best friend's lover, and in the end, Vina would discover that her best friend and the man she loved plotted together to ruin her and her son's lives.
title: Kapag Iginuhit Ang Hatol Ng Puso
